description: In desperation Skin Diamond answers a vague add for a job. During the interview she is given now further explanation of what she is expected to she. She is asked a series of strange and odd questions about her fears of being restrained, willingness to obey orders, and her ability to keep herself clean. Seem very odd to Skin, however, she needs fast cash and this is her ticket to ride. Mistress Lorelei Lee takes Skin to an undisclosed location where, once she walks through the door, she is expected to do whatever to whomever Lorelei has planned and she’s expected to put on the performance of her lifetime! Lorelei comes prepared as always with electro nipple and labia clamps, sticky pads, zappers and the samurai for a very special and unique DP. By the end Skin Diamond is completely sexually destroyed.
title: Beauty is Skin Deep An Electrosluts Feature
